profile: At Steam Dry Canada, our customers are our business. Whether it is our carpet, upholstery, area rug, furnace and duct cleaning, indoor air quality division or the flood rescue division, we strive to give our customers superior, detailed and precise results. Our service technicians will provide these superior services with integrity and sincere customer service. We don't send salespeople into our customers homes, we send qualified technicians that are focused on meeting and exceeding our customers expectations. We want to give our customers the most enjoyable in-home service that they have ever received and we are not satisfied until our customers are satisfied, guaranteed.

profile:
Sunset Blind & Shade, located in  Calgary , Alberta Business License BL214134 With a  criminal background check maintains a five star service rating on Google and Homestars. We offer Hunter Douglas, Graber, Maxxmar, window shades and blinds, custom drapery, custom wood poles, shutters, automation systems for drapery and blinds, textile manufacturing and quality installation services with one of the highest review scores in the city.
All our Blinds ,Shades and Shutters come with a complete Manufacturers warranty offered to the consumer directly with a no hassle guarantee,Free In Home Consultation ....... With all samples and color swatches offered with Integrity for over 20 years of service in  Calgary.
Sunset Blind & Shade has been operating in Calgary  since the early 1990’s in all aspects of the industry and has an established, proven track record. Our work can be seen in many residential settings and in some of Calgary’s finest condo settings and show-homes.

Offering the right product for your home or project is very important to us. As a small business we offer you sound technical advice on a variety of supreme products at a sensible price.

It is our mission to serve our clients with friendly advice, integrity and long lasting quality.

– Tom Winfield

profile: Sonata Design is multi generational company and industry leader in construction and design adjacent products including Window fashions, Wallcoverings, Home automation, Closet systems, and Architectural visualization. We provide our retail clients with an exceptional level of service while focusing on developing, maintaining, and deepening relationships with home builder, architect, and Interior design partners. We are headquartered in Calgary with divisions in Edmonton and Vancouver. Our state of the art showrooms are interactive, fun but more importantly, educational. Our company is energetic and brings a fresh perspective to the industry and we make sure clients are presented with products and services specific to their lifestyle.

profile:
WHY AMBITIOUS BLINDS?
At Ambitious Blinds, we believe that it is a privilege to be invited into your home. Once, there we will sit down with you to assess your needs, wants and expectations. We will then help you select a custom treatment that matches your criteria. As a family run business, we pride ourselves in offering similar service to that of our larger brick and mortar competitors but with a personal touch that only we can provide. Support local by buying our blinds by Vertican which are made in Alberta.  Contact us to experience the difference!

OUR APPROACH
Here at Ambitious blinds, we strive to provide our guest with an exceptional experience. That experience begins with our free consultation in the comfort of your home. During our visit, we will present a variety of samples and measure all windows, which you would like treated. We will assess the area and make suggestions based on your personal preferences and taste. 24 hours after visiting your home we will provide a few quotes/scenarios for you to consider. Our goal is to recommend high-quality window treatments at a competitive price. Once you are prepared to proceed we will collect a 65% deposit. We accept Visa, Master Card Debit, Cash and Email Money Transfer for your convenience. The final payment will be collected upon installation completion. The lead time for a custom order is typically 3 to 8 weeks.

 

Our #1 priority throughout the process is to look after your needs, earn your trust, respect and referrals. We believe word of mouth is still the most powerful means of advertising and to encourage you to spread the word we will offer you a Visa gift card for every successful order.

 

Thank you for considering Ambitious Blinds Inc!
